required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Novel Tumor Targeted Fluorescent TMTP1-ICG Mapping in Colposcopy-directed Biopsy

lead_sponsor.agency: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.source: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: Investigators aimed to determine the validity of the novel tumor targeted fluorescent TMTP1-ICG to increased accuracy of colposcopy-directed biopsy.

primary_outcome.description: Sensitivity of fluorescent detection of TMTP1-ICG compared to the sensitivity of ICG

secondary_outcome.description: Specificity of fluorescent detection of TMTP1-ICG compared to the sensitivity of ICG

arm_group.description: The TMTP1-ICG (WuXi AppTec, Shanghai, China) powder was diluted in 20 ml of aqueous sterile water to a concentration of 1.0 mg/mL. Then TMTP1-ICG spray was applied thoroughly to the ectocervix for 30 minutes. After cleaned by NS, fluorescent detected sites will be removed.

The ICG (WuXi AppTec, Shanghai, China) powder was diluted in 20 ml of aqueous sterile water to a concentration of 1.0 mg/mL. ICG spray was applied thoroughly to the ectocervix for 30 minutes. After cleaned by NS, fluorescent detected sites will be removed.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Suspicious of cervical disease required a colposcopy-directed biopsy.
- Subjects must sign an informed consent indicating awareness of the investigational nature of this study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Breast-feeding or pregnant.
- Ongoing participation in another clinical trial with an investigational drug with 3 months.
- Own allergy towards ICG and/or alcohol.
- Diagnosis of bacterial vaginosis, fungal vaginitis, sexually transmitted diseases.
- Patients with cardiac dysfunction or hepatic insufficiency or renal insufficiency.

facility.name: Tongji Hospital, Tongji Medical Colledge, HUST

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
